Flub.Name: SatMaps
Flub.Description: T

Flub.Name: Library
Flub.Description:
The Gaea SatMap library consists of hundreds of real life color patterns extracted from satellite data. You can choose from these different categories.
You can use the Random button to select maps randomly within the current library.
The Favorites button lets you filter the library to see only the ones you have marked as favorites. A map can be marked as a favorite by right-clicking it and select `Favorite`.

Flub.Name: Rocky
Flub.Description: This consists of rocky color patterns.

Flub.Name: Sandy
Flub.Description: This consists of sandy color patterns.

Flub.Name: Green
Flub.Description: This consists of green color patterns.

Flub.Name: Blue
Flub.Description: This consists of blue color patterns.

Flub.Name: Colorful
Flub.Description: This consists of colorful color patterns.

Flub.Name: SatMap Editor
Flub.Description: T

Flub.Name: Clip Color Map
Flub.Description: You can clip off sides of the color map to remove unwanted portions, or emphasize a specific part of the gradient.

Flub.Name: Bias
Flub.Description: Bias allows you to emphasize one side of the gradient over the other. This can be very useful when you want to reduce some color values or increase the influence of another.

Flub.Name: Samples
Flub.Description: The number of samples control the interpolation between gradient stops. Higher values create smoother output, but slows down the process.

Flub.Name: 256 (Fast)
Flub.Description: 256 samples

Flub.Name: 512 (Slower)
Flub.Description: 512 samples

Flub.Name: 1024 (Very Slow)
Flub.Description: 1024 samples

Flub.Name: 2048 (Overkill)
Flub.Description: 2048 samples

Flub.Name: Pre Processing
Flub.Description: T

Flub.Name: Reverse
Flub.Description: Reverse the direction of the color map.

Flub.Name: Jitter
Flub.Description: Randomly shift color values inside the color map for subtle randomization.

Flub.Name: Input Clarity
Flub.Description: Emphaize the clarity of the incoming map.

Flub.Name: Input Auto Level
Flub.Description: Apply auto level to the incoming map.

Flub.Name: Post Processing
Flub.Description: T

Flub.Name: Output Clarity
Flub.Description: Emphasize the clarity of the colorized map.

Flub.Name: Output Auto Level
Flub.Description: Apply auto level to the colorized map.

Flub.Name: Noise
Flub.Description: The amount of noise to add to the colorized map.

Flub.Name: Apply Brightness + Contrast
Flub.Description: Apply a Brightness and Contrast modification.

Flub.Name: Brightness
Flub.Description: The Brightness value.

Flub.Name: Contrast
Flub.Description: The Contrast value.

Flub.Name: Apply HSL
Flub.Description: Apply a Hue Saturation Luminosity modification.

Flub.Name: H
Flub.Description: The Hue value.

Flub.Name: S
Flub.Description: The Saturation value.

Flub.Name: L
Flub.Description: The Luminosity value.
